channel.title: Opposing Force Crash
channel.description:
Hello, I have a Problem with Opposing Force. Everytime when i want to enter the room where Gordon is teleporting to Xen, my Game crashes and i can do nothing (luckily i have 2 monitors so i can kill the HL.exe in TaskManager). It just happes when I push the button for the door. I have tried to reinstall it but thath doesnt helped. I have tried to noclip in the room (without pushing the door button), but everytime I enter the room from another site, the game crashes again. So I cant get to the Teleporter for the next map. When I want to skip the Map ("map x" in console) I have no weapons. I hope you can help me and sorry for my bad english, im from German^^.
€: Forgotten my Sys: AMD Phenom 4x2,95GHz nVidia Gforce GTX 260 nVidia Gforce 8600 GT for PhysX Corsair Dominator Ram DDR2 (810 MHz, CL4) Windows XP

item.title: Opposing Force Crash
item.dc:creator: ManlyStump
item.description:
sersoft:

it’s a well known bug. you have to avoid looking at the teleporter, try to enter the room backwards in noclip

I’m sorry, but that is one AWESOME workaround

Read full topic

item.title: Opposing Force Crash
item.dc:creator: xTheHackeRx
item.description:
Hello,
I have a Problem with Opposing Force. Everytime when i want to enter the room where Gordon is teleporting to Xen, my Game crashes and i can do nothing (luckily i have 2 monitors so i can kill the HL.exe in TaskManager). It just happes when I push the button for the door.
I have tried to reinstall it but thath doesnt helped. I have tried to noclip in the room (without pushing the door button), but everytime I enter the room from another site, the game crashes again. So I cant get to the Teleporter for the next map. When I want to skip the Map (“map x” in console) I have no weapons. I hope you can help me and sorry for my bad english, im from German^^.
